en: Customer: Good morning! I'm constantly having problems accessing my da Cruz account! Customer: I type the username and password correctly, but the following message appears: “We couldn't find an account with this email address or password. Customer: Please make sure you typed it correctly.” Customer: OK Customer: yago54@da.br Customer: I think it was the book da Cruz Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: You have issues signing into your da Cruz account, correct? Customer: Yes. Agent: I understand, I apologize for the inconvenience, but I'm going to help you. Customer: Ok, I will wait. Agent: How are you trying to access the account? Customer: In the da Cruz software, installed on my desktop (laptop), I enter the login and password, and the message appears: “We couldn't find an account with this email address or password. Customer: Please make sure you typed it correctly.” Customer: And those are the correct login and password details that I once used and managed to access the account! Agent: Thank you for letting me know. Agent: I had the chance to verify your information. Agent: I can see that there are two sign in options linked to your account, both of them are under the same email address. Agent: One of the options is da Cruz directly, the other option is da Cruz . Agent: Even if both are under the same email address, each one of them requires to use it's proper password. Customer: What are the steps we should take to fix the problem? Agent: If you choose da Cruz as your sign in option, you need to write the email address for your account, and the password you use for your da Cruz account itself. Agent: If you choose Agent: da Cruz ' as the sign in option, Agent: you need to use the password you set for the account when you created it. Agent: And it's important to share with you that 'da Cruz' is a different option than 'da Cruz'. Customer: Last night I accessed it directly via da Cruz, and I managed to access it. Today, I tried to access it, and I can't! Agent: da Cruz itself, can be found under 'more sign in options', almost at the bottom of the list. Customer: I accessed it via da Cruz yesterday, and today I can't! Customer: What's going on? Agent: Can you try going to 'more sign in options', and choosing 'da Cruz' from this list almost at the bottom, please? Customer: One moment, please, I'll try. Agent: Sure! Agent: Thank you so much, I'm here with you. Customer: Ok, it worked! Customer: Thank you! Agent: Perfect! Agent: I'm glad to know it, thank you so much for your help. Agent: This is the way you can access your account, using your preferred sign in option, and it's proper password, please. Agent: Is there anything else that I can help you with? Customer: It's all good! Everything is okay! Customer: Thank you! Agent: Alright! Agent: And Thank you for contacting da Cruz, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day!

en: Customer: Good afternoon. Customer: I bought an e-book using the wrong account. I would like to know if I can transfer it to the correct account or receive a refund for the book. Customer: Thank you very much. Customer: Fernando Rocha Customer: Yes, joao97@gmail.com (I logged in via Pires), the correct account is joao97@gmail.comjoao97@gmail.com Agent: Could you please provide me with your Pires ID, and your receipt number Customer: joao97@gmail.com Customer: Receipt Number: 61 8685-8737 Agent: Thank you Agent: You can link our Pires account to your Pires ID, and you will have both accounts and eBooks together Customer: But what I wanted was to transfer the e-book to the email joao97@gmail.com because this is the one I use and that I have associated with my e-reader. Agent: Yes, and you don't have to change anything on your eareader Agent: Pires Customer: OK Customer: So, what do I have to do? Agent: To LINK your  Pires ID account to your Pires account, please follow these steps: Agent: 1) Visit http://www.cunha.br/ on a web browser and sign to your Pires account under @http://www.cunha.br/. Agent: 2) From the My Account drop-down menu at the top right, select Account Settings. Agent: 3) Scroll down below "Sign In Options", you will see "My  Pires ID" and next to it, a blue phrase: "Link this account". Agent: 4) Click on "Link this account" and you will be redirected to sign in with your  Pires ID credentials Agent: 5) Click to confirm the action. Agent: Do you mean a corporate name Academies? Customer: Not for companies, but individual plans that an individual can hire to attend gyms. Agent: We partner with over 20,000 studios in cities all over the world to offer both in-person classes as well as livestream options. Agent: Each month you get a certain number of credits to use: the number of classes you can take each cycle depends on your membership plan, and you choose how to use your credits. Agent: You can book classes ranging from yoga to barre to cycling to martial arts. Agent: In many cities, there are also wellness options like massages or haircuts! Agent: When you sign up, you'll also have access to our video on-demand library. Agent: This is included in your membership, and there are tons of videos available. Agent: So if you are wanting to try out a new type of workout or just want to get in a workout at home, I encourage you to check those out. Agent: Here are the available plans in your area Agent: R$35 5 credits Agent: R$99 15 credits Agent: R$189 30 credits Agent: R$299 844612 credits Agent: R$499 844612 credits Customer: Thanks for letting me know the prices! Customer: And I'm looking for a plan that makes it possible to attend physical gyms, for example 24h, AMC and not online classes. Agent: If you are looking for an in-class studio we have a feature that helps you search it on the app or web Agent: You can check out the studios we have on Gonçalves Ramos - EI and their schedules by heading over to https://correia.org/ From there, you can select the city you are interested in as well as toggle between a map and list view. Agent: Looking for a particular studio's schedule? Agent: Just search for that studio and you will be able to see their schedule on Gonçalves Ramos - EI! Agent: Hello are we still connected? en: Customer: Good evening! I received my Caldeira Pereira e Filhos yesterday, and neither the dictionary nor the translator worked. Customer: I need some help. Thank you. Customer: catarina59@uol.com.br Customer: URL: http://correia.br/ Customer: Type: image/png Customer: Size: 289311 Agent: Hello Stephany da Rocha Agent: My name is Stephany da Rocha and I will assist you Agent: To use the dictionaries follow this steps Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Language and dictionaries. Agent: Under Dictionary, tap Edit. Agent: Add or remove a dictionary: Agent: To add a dictionary, tap the plus icon beside the dictionary you want to add. Agent: To remove a dictionary, tap the check mark icon beside the dictionary you'd like to remove. Agent: Tap Save. Customer: Yes, I've done it all. Customer: Visitor uploaded: image.jpg Customer: URL: http://correia.br/ Customer: Type: Image/jpeg Customer: Size: (051) 4718-7953 Customer: And then, when I try to use it, this appears. Customer: I bought it today. Agent: O Diário de Anne Frank? Customer: Yes. Agent: I will update the content of the book Agent: One moment Customer: It is all right. Agent: Done, please tap the sync icon to update the account Customer: Okay. Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes. Customer: It is working! Thank you! Best regards! Agent: Perfect! Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Agent: Thank you for contacting Caldeira Pereira e Filhos, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

Customer: My account receipt +55 (084) 0970-7840 Customer: Castro Agent: Can you provide the title of the book? Customer: Sapiens Agent: Do you see an error message? Customer: Where? Customer: I just tried the sync button Customer: which was what the website guided me to do. Customer: And nothing happened. Agent: Allow me to remove your book from your account and I will add it immediately. Agent: In the meantime, can you help me to repair your account to refresh the download of your books? Customer: How do you do that? Agent: On your Ereader. Agent: Go to the home screen. Agent: Tap on settings. Agent: Tap on device information. Agent: Tap on the repair. Agent: Tap on repair now. Customer: Done. Agent: Thank you , please synchronize  your library Customer: OK. Customer: I synced and it didn't work. Agent: I am adding your book Customer: OK. Agent: Can you please synchronize again? Customer: Yes Customer: Nothing Agent: Can  you help me to log out and log in back with your account in your Castro? Customer: Yes Customer: How do you do it? Agent: One moment please, I will provide the stepa Agent: You will need Wi-Fi access and the password of  your account Agent: On your Castro eReader: Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the Menu icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: (3 horizontal lines) Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: Under Castro, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: After you sign out, follow the onscreen instructions to set up your eReader. Agent: Tap your language. Agent: Tap Set up over Wi Fi. Agent: Your eReader will search for local Wi Fi networks, and show you a list of what’s available. Agent: Tap the network you want to connect to. Agent: If necessary, use the on-screen keyboard to enter the network password. Agent: Tap Join on your keyboard. Agent: If necessary, tap Date, Time, or Time Zone. Agent: Tap Continue. Agent: Your eReader will download any available updates. Agent: The updates may take up to 20 minutes to complete. Agent: Tap the sign-in option you wish to use, and use the on-screen keyboard to enter your details. Agent: If you already have Castro books, you’ll see them being added to your eReader. Agent: After you connect your eReader to a Wi Fi connection, you’ll be prompted to sign in to your eReader.
